title: Festa di San Giacomo
text:

Festa di San Giacomo
La festa di San Giacomo avr√† luogo a Maspiano, frazione di Sale Marasino, il 25 Luglio 2025. Alle ore 20.00 si terr√† la Santa Messa e, a seguire, la tradizionale processione.
Alle ore 21.00 avr√† inizio il torneo di briscola a cui si potr√† partecipare tramite prenotazione.

author: Ryan Carter
title: Rose Parade 2024: Weather forecast says mostly sunny for New Year‚Äôs Day
text: It‚Äôs looking good for New Year‚Äôs Day on Colorado Boulevard. A forecast of a slight chance of rain earlier in the week has turned into mostly sunny skies, boding well for the Tournament of Roses‚Äô streak of years since of 2006 with no rain. In fact, it‚Äôs shaping up to be quite a nice morning for the Rose Parade, which runs from 8 a.m. to 10 a.m. Monday, with the Rose Bowl Game in the afternoon. According to the National Weather Service, Monday will be mostly sunny, with a high near 64. - Read more Rose Parade coverage [here](https://www.pasadenastarnews.com/tag/rose-parade/) Even if there is rain, it likely won‚Äôt be much. The next in a series of storms will impact Southern California, but the core of the storm will stay off the cost on its way to norther Baja, according to the Weather Service. ‚ÄúAny area that receives rain will generally stay under 0.10 inches, with a local amount to 0.25 inches possible,‚Äù according to the National Weather Service. And it‚Äôs unlikely it cause the kind of problems other parts of the region are seeing. Parts of Los Angeles County experienced flooding this morning as a strong one-day rainstorm hit the area, creating dangerous conditions on roads and at beaches. A flood advisory was in effect until 11 a.m. for a portion of southwest California, including central and southern Los Angeles County, and far eastern Ventura County, according to the National Weather Service. Local law enforcement agencies reported some urban and small stream flooding in the advisory area. Some locations that were warned about possible flooding include Long Beach, Malibu, Griffith Park, Hollywood, downtown Los Angeles, Universal City, Burbank, Beverly Hills, North Hollywood, Culver City, Alhambra, Inglewood, Pasadena, Van Nuys, Venice, Santa Monica and Encino. The NWS also issued a special weather statement for the areas of Santa Clarita, Newhall and San Fernando, where winds up to 50 mph were expected. Meanwhile, a high surf warning was in effect until 10 p.m. Saturday for all Los Angeles County beaches, including the Malibu Coast and Catalina Island. So, you might pack an umbrella or poncho, just in case. But bottom line: You likely won‚Äôt need it in Pasadena. Fingers crossed. Organizers don‚Äôt like to talk much about the rain, for fear of jinxing the giant annual spectacle, which from its beginnings was all about promoting the region‚Äôs sunny weather disposition and its flowers. That may be a good strategy. In fact, over the course of its 134-year history, the event has had 124 sunny iterations and just 10 soggy ones. And it looks like the 135th year will follow that pattern. The answer is part odds, part science, explained Daniel Swain, climate scientist at UCLA‚Äôs Institute of the Environment & Sustainability in a recent interview with the Southern California News Group. January is actually at the peak of Southern California‚Äôs rainy season when temporary southward shifts in the Pacific storm track, driven by variations in the jet stream, create large rain storms, he said. But, that only happens ‚Äúa relative handful of times‚Äù in any given winter. In L.A. County, there is approximately a 10% to 15% chance of experiencing rainfall on any given day in January, he said. In comparison, it has only rained on approximately 8% of Rose Parades, according to information provided by the Tournament of Roses. It doesn‚Äôt hurt, experts say, that the parade only takes up a morning fraction of a day when rain could happen before or after. Get ready to smell the roses, instead of a rain-soaked pavement. Staff writers Clara Harter and Ryan Carter, and City News Service, contributed to this article.

author: Bryan Everson
title: Kosmo gazes at his Week 2 football predictions after a strong start opening week
text:
In case anyone thought Kosmo had lost a step in the offseason, opening week proved that his reads are still pretty darn good.
A record of 5-2 could have been 6-1 if not for a 22-21 victory overtime win by Rochester Adams over Romeo that made Kosmo look silly for picking against the OAA side.
Props go to Clarkston, too, as Kosmo got that pick right, but the Wolves showed that they could hang with what‚Äôs perceived to be the best team ‚Äî and QB ‚Äî in the state in Belleville. Justin Pintar‚Äôs team didn‚Äôt get a first-place vote in the OAA Red Preseason Coaches Poll, but more Friday‚Äôs like the last could give them a say alongside the two teams that did, West Bloomfield and Lake Orion.
Kosmo The second weekend includes a few city rivalry battles that have Kosmo chomping at the bit, including the Highlanders in action to either prove Kosmo right or wrong yet again, as well as some juicy OAA crossovers featuring divisional contenders.
Here are the picks with Week 2 upon us:
Rochester Adams at Rochester ‚Äî Kosmo remembers 2018 as the last time Rochester put up a real good fight against Adams, as the Falcons took their rivals to double-overtime before losing 28-27 in that year‚Äôs opener. The Falcons, like Adams, were victors in their OAA-MAC crossover on opening weekend, beating Fraser 38-7. Long story short, if Adams fools twice, shame on Kosmo. Kosmo says: Rochester Adams
Walled Lake Northern at Walled Lake Central ‚Äî The Knights had a tough start to the season on home turf, getting blanked 35-0 by South Lyon. It looks like they‚Äôll be tested by another tough defense when they make the short trip to Oakley Park Rd. and take on the Vikings, who beat Berkley 7-0 in OT to start the season. Northern trounced in last year‚Äôs meeting, 38-3, and while it may not be as high-octane this year, it may be the same result. Kosmo says: WL Northern
Jackson Lumen Christi at Pontiac Notre Dame Prep ‚Äî Two-time defending Division 7 champs and perennial power Jackson Lumen Christi visits the Fighting Irish for a matchup Kosmo circled so many times he had to have more pens supply dropped to the cave. The Titans are on the hunt for a three-peat as they move up to Division 6, while NDP got started by flying high with a 49-14 victory over Detroit Central to begin the quest for a Division 5 playoff appearance. Both teams should punch a postseason ticket, but there can only be one winner Friday night. Kosmo says: Jackson Lumen Christi
Toledo Catholic Central (OH) at Detroit Catholic Central ‚Äî Last week featured plenty of county crossovers, but how about a battle between the Shamrocks against a CHSL opponent from the state which shall not be named by Michigan fans? The Irish opened with a victory over crosstown rival Whitmer, while the Shamrocks packed an offensive punch with a 56-12 road win at Dearborn. It‚Äôs a tall task, but Kosmo would rather be sinking with the ship than choose a team from that place down south. Kosmo says: Detroit Catholic Central
Auburn Hills Avondale at Birmingham Seaholm ‚Äî It‚Äôs a battle between two teams picked to win their respective OAA divisions. The Maples proved that they still have something left in the cupboard despite graduating some hard-hitters with their 42-0 thumping of Troy Athens in Week 1. Avondale, meanwhile, came up short in a 20-14 defeat against Cedar Springs, and the Yellow Jackets might have to wait until the third week to put one up in the win column with the OAA Blue favs on deck. Kosmo says: Seaholm
Clarkston at Southfield A&T ‚Äî The Keith McKenzie era got off to a roaring start with A&T‚Äôs 46-0 romp of Flint Beecher, and Kosmo couldn‚Äôt be happier for the defending champs. But Kosmo saw the opening game tape of the Wolves, who were capable of big plays through the air and also of generating turnovers. They may turn Southfield into their den this Friday. Kosmo says: Clarkston
West Bloomfield at Birmingham Groves ‚Äî Here are two teams that probably couldn‚Äôt be more smitten with their results to start the fall. Kosmo noticed that the Lakers wrote the book for defending the OAA‚Äôs reputation with last week‚Äôs 42-0 dispatching of Chippewa Valley. Now it‚Äôs time for a trip to take on the team picked to win the OAA White, Groves, who beat Detroit U-D Jesuit 35-14 on the road in Week 1. Kosmo knows the Falcons are trying to party like it‚Äôs 2019, the last time they beat the Lakers, but Kosmo thinks any celebrations that involve beating the Lakers this season will be few and far between. Kosmo says: West Bloomfield

author: Joe Jervis
title: NJ Man Approaches Wild Bison, Gets Usual Result
text:
Via press release from the National Park Service :
On June 10, a 30-year-old man from Randolph, New Jersey, was injured by a bison in Yellowstone National Park.
At approximately 9:45 a.m. in the Upper Geyser Basin at Old Faithful, a man was gored by a bison after a large group of visitors approached it too closely. The individual was treated and transported by emergency medical personnel.
The incident is currently under investigation, and no further details are available at this time. There are no photos or videos of this incident to share.
This is the second reported incident of a person injured by a bison in 2025. The first occurred on May 7. There were two reported incidents in 2024 and one in 2023.
Bison will defend their space when threatened and have injured more people in Yellowstone than any other animal. They are unpredictable and can run three times faster than humans.
Read the full press release .
A 30-year-old man from Randolph, New Jersey, was injured by a bison in Yellowstone National Park‚Äôs Upper Geyser Basin near Old Faithful on the morning of June 10. https://t.co/d67DvHFJPL pic.twitter.com/OskTHrUcZ3
‚Äî CBS New York (@CBSNewYork) June 11, 2025

author: Carolina Rodrigues
title: "Bruno Lage √© um treinador de sucesso e com t√≠tulos no Benfica"
text: "Bruno Lage √© um treinador de sucesso e com t√≠tulos no Benfica" O presidente do Benfica apresentou hoje Bruno Lage como novo treinador da equipa de futebol e justificou a escolha "f√°cil e r√°pida" por se tratar de um treinador de sucesso e que j√° conquistou t√≠tulos no clube. "√â com grande orgulho que apresento Bruno Lage. Uma escolha f√°cil e r√°pida da nossa parte. Tem o perfil necess√°rio para dirigir a equipa neste momento. √â um t√©cnico conhecedor do clube pelos anos que representou esta casa e √© um t√©cnico de sucesso, que j√° conquistou t√≠tulos no Benfica", disse Rui Costa na apresenta√ß√£o de Bruno Lage como sucessor do alem√£o Roger Schmidt. O presidente 'encarnado' lembrou que o novo treinador teve esse sucesso na Luz num per√≠odo "ainda mais complicado" do que aquele que se vive hoje. "Dentro de todas as circunst√¢ncias, consider√°mos de forma r√°pida que Bruno Lage reunia todas as condi√ß√µes e teria todo o nosso apoio para dirigir a equipa principal do Benfica. Neste impasse de sa√≠da de um treinador e entrada de outro, cada adepto tem as suas prefer√™ncias, o que √© respeit√°vel, mas tenho a certeza de que, a partir deste momento, ter√° o apoio e o respeito de todos os benfiquistas", afirmou Rui Costa. A op√ß√£o por Bruno Lage assentou, segundo o presidente dos 'encarnados', em pressupostos de ordem t√©cnica, os quais s√£o bem conhecidos pelo seu passado na Luz, e de ordem sentimental, pela sua liga√ß√£o ao clube. [Virando-se para Bruno Lage] "Al√©m das tuas qualidades como treinador, ter√°s tamb√©m aquilo que todos os benfiquistas querem ver. Tenho a certeza absoluta que viver√°s cada dia, cada treino, cada jogo, com o sentimento que sempre representaste, que √© o sentimento de cada benfiquista. Disso n√£o tenho a menor d√∫vida!", reafirmou o 'timoneiro' dos 'encarnados'. O regresso de Bruno Lage √† Luz, um treinador que j√° teve sucesso no clube, faz com que Rui Costa n√£o tenha d√∫vidas de que √© o treinador indicado para este momento, a quem dirigiu as √∫ltimas palavras. "Bruno, que tenhas sucesso, que possas repetir o que j√° conseguiste fazer neste clube e que no final da √©poca possamos refazer esta foto com a conquista do 39, que √© o desejo de todos os benfiquistas e que sei que vais lutar por isso", rematou.

author: France Bleu
title: √ânergie : les syndicats appellent √† la gr√®ve le 5 d√©cembre pour les salaires
text:
√ânergie : les syndicats appellent √† la gr√®ve le 5 d√©cembre pour les salaires
Les syndicats de l'√©nergie appellent √† la gr√®ve le 5 d√©cembre pour demander des augmentations salariales, a appris l'AFP ce vendredi. Cela interviendra le m√™me jour que la gr√®ve dans la fonction publique.
Une intersyndicale a appel√© √† la gr√®ve pour les salaires jeudi 5 d√©cembre dans "l'ensemble des entreprises du secteur √©lectrique et gazier", a appris l'AFP ce vendredi de sources syndicales. Cet appel intervient alors que les n√©gociations salariales ont d√©but√© dans les entreprises et ne sont "pas au niveau" des revendications de l'intersyndicale (CGT/CFE-CGC/CFDT/FO), a indiqu√© une source syndicale. Dans le secteur des industries √©lectriques et gazi√®res, les augmentations g√©n√©rales sont d√©cid√©es au niveau de la branche et s'appliquent dans l'ensemble des entreprises, qui n√©gocient ensuite une enveloppe d'augmentations individuelles, l'addition des deux donnant l'augmentation globale des salari√©s.
"En augmentation g√©n√©rale, on est √† +0,8% (...). En entreprises, l'ensemble des quatre organisations syndicales repr√©sentatives de la branche ont demand√© 2,3% en mesures individuelles", a d√©clar√© √† l'AFP Laurent Koessler, charg√© du dialogue social √† la CFE-Energies, deuxi√®me organisation du secteur, qui compte un peu moins de 140.000 salari√©s. Or, "les n√©gociations en entreprises ont commenc√© et on n'est pas √† ce niveau", a-t-il ajout√©. "√Ä la suite de la s√©ance d'ouverture de la n√©gociation sur les mesures salariales 2025, la premi√®re proposition de la direction d'EDF est un faible taux de 1,5%", a indiqu√© l'intersyndicale dans un tract. Elle demande √† la direction de "revenir en n√©gociation en proposant bien plus pour r√©pondre aux 2,3% revendiqu√©s sur les mesures individuelles".
Pour les m√™mes raisons, l'intersyndicale appelle √† faire gr√®ve "chez EDF, chez Enedis et sur l'ensemble des entreprises du secteur √©lectrique et gazier, donc il n'y a pas une seule entreprise qui √©chappe au pr√©avis de gr√®ve", a ajout√© Laurent Koessler, une information confirm√©e par la CGT d'EDF et la CGT de GRDF.
Un mouvement reconductible
La date du 5 d√©cembre correspond √† une r√©union pr√©vue de l'organe de branche de l'√©nergie pour n√©gocier d'autres sujets, a indiqu√© Laurent Koessler. Cette journ√©e se trouve √™tre "le m√™me jour" que [la journ√©e de gr√®ve dans la fonction publique](https://www.francebleu.fr/infos/economie-social/fonction-publique-les-syndicats-appellent-a-une-journee-de-greve-le-5-decembre-4487294), a-t-il soulign√©, avec des revendications sur le pouvoir d'achat "√† peu pr√®s identiques". L'appel √† la gr√®ve d√©bute officiellement la veille √† 21 heures, pour les √©quipes de nuit, comme traditionnellement dans le secteur de l'√©nergie.
Cette journ√©e de gr√®ve ne devrait pas avoir de cons√©quences trop visibles pour le public, a pronostiqu√© Laurent Koessler, et devrait surtout se traduire par un manque √† gagner pour les entreprises. Mais, pr√©vient-il, "c'est en fonction du r√©sultat", donc de la mobilisation, "et des r√©actions des employeurs", que le mouvement, reconductible, pourra √©ventuellement se durcir. "L'intersyndicale se r√©unira le 5 au soir pour d√©cider des suites √† donner", a-t-il conclu.

author: 24horas
title: El Atl√©tico de Madrid se veng√≥ del Real Madrid y lo elimin√≥ de la Copa del Rey | 24horas
text: El Atl√©tico de Madrid se tom√≥ la revancha en el derby madrile√±o ante el [Real Madrid](/24horas/site/tag/port/all/tagport_1267_1.html), firmando su pase a los cuartos de final de la Copa del Rey. Saca Modriƒá un libre directo y, tras un salto entre varios jugadores y Oblak, el bal√≥n entra en la porter√≠a local. üÜö [@Atleti](https://twitter.com/Atleti?ref_src=twsrc^tfw) | 1-1 | [@realmadrid](https://twitter.com/realmadrid?ref_src=twsrc^tfw) | 46‚Äô üì∫ [@La1_tve](https://twitter.com/La1_tve?ref_src=twsrc^tfw) ‚ÑπÔ∏è Minuto a Minuto: [https://t.co/CAQw8fCr6Y](https://t.co/CAQw8fCr6Y) [#LaCopaMola](https://twitter.com/hashtag/LaCopaMola?src=hash&ref_src=twsrc^tfw)üèÜ | [#CopaDelRey](https://twitter.com/hashtag/CopaDelRey?src=hash&ref_src=twsrc^tfw) [pic.twitter.com/4UcJfx08QD](https://t.co/4UcJfx08QD) [January 18, 2024](https://twitter.com/rfef/status/1748093520949186650?ref_src=twsrc^tfw) ‚öΩÔ∏è ¬°¬°G L DEL REAL MADRID!! Apenas unos minutos entrada la segunda parte, √Ålvaro Morata volver√≠a a darle la ventaja a los dirigidos por Diego Simeone, tras una mala comunicaci√≥n entre el arquero Andriy Lunin y su defensa. ‚öΩÔ∏è ¬°¬°MOOOORAAAATAAAA G L!! ¬°¬°MARCA EL ATL√âTICO DE MADRID!! El delantero internacional aprovecha un rebote en el √°rea y adelanta a los rojiblancos. üÜö [@Atleti](https://twitter.com/Atleti?ref_src=twsrc^tfw) | 2-1 | [@realmadrid](https://twitter.com/realmadrid?ref_src=twsrc^tfw) | 57‚Äô üì∫ [@La1_tve](https://twitter.com/La1_tve?ref_src=twsrc^tfw) ‚ÑπÔ∏è Minuto a Minuto: [https://t.co/CAQw8fCr6Y](https://t.co/CAQw8fCr6Y) [#LaCopaMola](https://twitter.com/hashtag/LaCopaMola?src=hash&ref_src=twsrc^tfw)üèÜ | [#CopaDelRey](https://twitter.com/hashtag/CopaDelRey?src=hash&ref_src=twsrc^tfw) [pic.twitter.com/iLPzaoxClY](https://t.co/iLPzaoxClY) [January 18, 2024](https://twitter.com/rfef/status/1748101362452205595?ref_src=twsrc^tfw) ‚öΩÔ∏è ¬°¬°MOOOORAAAATAAAA G L!! ¬°¬°MARCA EL ATL√âTICO DE MADRID!! A pesar de ir en desventaja, los dirigidos por Carlo Ancelotti lograr√≠an igualar la serie en el 81' gracias a un centro de Jude Bellingham que conectar√≠a Joselu de cabeza. ‚öΩÔ∏è ¬°¬°G L DEL REAL MADRIIIID!! ¬°¬°JOOOOSEEELUUUU PONE EL EMPATEEE!! Remata de cabeza el delantero en el segundo palo a pase medido de Jude Bellingham. üÜö [@Atleti](https://twitter.com/Atleti?ref_src=twsrc^tfw) | 2-2 | [@realmadrid](https://twitter.com/realmadrid?ref_src=twsrc^tfw) | 82‚Äô üì∫ [@La1_tve](https://twitter.com/La1_tve?ref_src=twsrc^tfw) ‚ÑπÔ∏è Minuto a Minuto: [https://t.co/CAQw8fCr6Y](https://t.co/CAQw8fCr6Y) [#LaCopaMola](https://twitter.com/hashtag/LaCopaMola?src=hash&ref_src=twsrc^tfw)üèÜ | [#CopaDelRey](https://twitter.com/hashtag/CopaDelRey?src=hash&ref_src=twsrc^tfw) [pic.twitter.com/DQu2Kb9YkW](https://t.co/DQu2Kb9YkW) [January 18, 2024](https://twitter.com/rfef/status/1748107643527246095?ref_src=twsrc^tfw) ‚öΩÔ∏è ¬°¬°G L DEL REAL MADRIIIID!! ¬°¬°JOOOOSEEELUUUU PONE EL EMPATEEE!! El derby madrile√±o se ir√≠a al tiempo extra, donde los rojiblancos ser√≠an m√°s contundentes gracias a los goles de Antoine Griezmann en el 100' y Rodrigo Riquelme en el 118', mientras que los merengues acusar√≠an el cansancio del tr√°mite del encuentro, sin poder recuperarse de estos dos goles. ‚öΩÔ∏è ¬°¬°QU√â GOLAZOOOO!! ¬°¬°MARCA GRIEZMANN!! ¬°¬°MARCA EL ATL√âTICO DE MADRID!! Se adelanta de nuevo el conjunto rojiblanco con un tanto espectacular del galo. üÜö [@Atleti](https://twitter.com/Atleti?ref_src=twsrc^tfw) | 3-2 | [@realmadrid](https://twitter.com/realmadrid?ref_src=twsrc^tfw) | 100‚Äô üì∫ [@La1_tve](https://twitter.com/La1_tve?ref_src=twsrc^tfw) ‚ÑπÔ∏è Minuto a Minuto: [https://t.co/CAQw8fCr6Y](https://t.co/CAQw8fCr6Y) [#LaCopaMola](https://twitter.com/hashtag/LaCopaMola?src=hash&ref_src=twsrc^tfw)üèÜ | [#CopaDelRey](https://twitter.com/hashtag/CopaDelRey?src=hash&ref_src=twsrc^tfw) [pic.twitter.com/ViSKO73KXV](https://t.co/ViSKO73KXV) [January 18, 2024](https://twitter.com/rfef/status/1748114458306617400?ref_src=twsrc^tfw) ‚öΩÔ∏è ¬°¬°QU√â GOLAZOOOO!! ¬°¬°MARCA GRIEZMANN!! ¬°¬°MARCA EL ATL√âTICO DE MADRID!! ‚öΩÔ∏è ¬°¬°G L DE RODRIGO RIQUELMEEEE!! ¬°¬°EL CUARTO DEL ATLETIII!! Gran contra local y gran definici√≥n del jugador rojiblanco. üÜö [@Atleti](https://twitter.com/Atleti?ref_src=twsrc^tfw) | 4-2 | [@realmadrid](https://twitter.com/realmadrid?ref_src=twsrc^tfw) | 119‚Äô üì∫ [@La1_tve](https://twitter.com/La1_tve?ref_src=twsrc^tfw) ‚ÑπÔ∏è Minuto a Minuto: [https://t.co/CAQw8fCr6Y](https://t.co/CAQw8fCr6Y) [#LaCopaMola](https://twitter.com/hashtag/LaCopaMola?src=hash&ref_src=twsrc^tfw)üèÜ | [#CopaDelRey](https://twitter.com/hashtag/CopaDelRey?src=hash&ref_src=twsrc^tfw) [pic.twitter.com/g2vioueTka](https://t.co/g2vioueTka) [January 18, 2024](https://twitter.com/rfef/status/1748119889347256582?ref_src=twsrc^tfw) ‚öΩÔ∏è ¬°¬°G L DE RODRIGO RIQUELMEEEE!! ¬°¬°EL CUARTO DEL ATLETIII!! Con este resultado, el Atl√©tico de Madrid se meti√≥ a los cuartos de final de la Copa del Rey, quedando a la espera del rival que ser√° definido por sorteo, y se tom√≥ revancha del Real Madrid, cuadro que hace ocho d√≠as lo elimin√≥ de la Supercopa de Espa√±a.
